text: #COVID-19 Therapeutics Accelerator selects @MORUBKK to lead placebo-controlled study of #chloroquine & #hydroxychloroquine in preventing COVID-19 in 40,000+ at-risk health care workers, frontline staff & other high-risk groups in Asia and Europe  https://t.co/MYo6ZgvgfI https://t.co/AKuHIxaZuc
